src:
云顶马来西亚子公司向建发购帝国1320万股
05 Nov 2019, 07:17 by Chong Jin Hun
（吉隆坡5日讯）云顶马来西亚（Genting Malaysia Bhd）独资子公司云顶（美国）有限公司周一（4日）以每股9.74每美元的价格，向建发实业III私人有限公司收购帝国度假村（Empire Resorts Inc）的1320万股。
这是云顶马来西亚-建发实业联营，以私有化美国上市赌场营运商帝国的计划。
“随着这项收购，云顶美国如今持有帝国38.3%股权，假设所有流通的优先股全部转换为普通股，则稀释至33.3%。”
云顶马来西亚指出：“云顶美国和建发实业完成拟议收购与合并计划无关，也不附条件。”
今年8月6日，云顶马来西亚向大马交易所报备，该集团与建发实业于8月5日签署具约束力的条款清单，云顶美国将以约1亿2860万美元（5亿3880万令吉）或每股9.74美元，收购帝国的1320万股。
根据云顶马来西亚，将通过云顶美国连同建发实业向帝国提交一份初步非约束提案，以合并的方式收购与建发实业无关的帝国股东持有的流通股。
截至3时，云顶马来西亚起2仙或0.62%，报3.26令吉，交投量有709万9600股。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Genting Malaysia unit buys 13.2 million Empire shares from Kien Huat

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Genting Malaysia subsidiary purchased 13.2 million shares of the Empire
05 Nov 2019, 07:17 by Chong Jin Hun
KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Genting Malaysia (Genting Malaysia Bhd) wholly-owned subsidiary Genting (USA) Co., Ltd. acquired Imperial Resorts from Jianfa Industrial III Pte. Ltd. at a price of 9.74 US dollars per share on Monday (4th). Inc.'s 13.2 million shares.
This is the plan of Genting Malaysia-Jianfa Industrial Joint Venture to privatize the US-listed casino operator empire.
“With this acquisition, Genting USA now holds a 38.3% stake in the Empire, assuming all of the preferred shares in circulation are converted to common stock, diluted to 33.3%.”
Genting Malaysia pointed out: "Genting USA and Jianfa Industrial have no connection with the completion of the proposed acquisition and merger plan, and are not conditional."
On August 6 this year, Genting Malaysia reported to the Bursa Malaysia that the group and Jianfa Industrial signed a binding list of terms on August 5, and Genting USA will use approximately US$128.6 million (538.8 million). Ringgit) or $9.74 per share, acquired 13.2 million shares of the Empire.
According to Genting Malaysia, a preliminary unconstrained proposal will be submitted to the Empire through Genting USA and Jianfa Industrial to acquire the outstanding shares held by Imperial shareholders unrelated to Jianfa Industrial.
As of 3 o'clock, Genting Malaysia received 2 sen or 0.62%, reported RM3.26, and the trading volume was 709,900,600 shares.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Genting Malaysia unit buys 13.2 million Empire shares from Kien Huat

Via theedgemarkets.com
